title: Mega Man Arcade Table
detail: Battle your personal Mega Man character against your friends' with our holographic arcade table!
extended_details: A wooden arcade table with a holographic pyramid that use Pepper's Ghost to project each player's character onto a 3D 3x6 play field. On each side of the arcade table, there is a set of arcade buttons that players can control their characters with. Input from these controllers is handled by an Arduino Une that acts as a USB keyboard that controls the game running on a Raspberry Pi. Gameplay is based on Mega Man Battle Network.
